**Day 7-8: Badrinath Darshan**
‚Ä¢ Drive to Badrinath (220km)

‚Ä¢ Mana village visit (last Indian village)
‚Ä¢ Tapt Kund bath

**Day 9: Badrinath ‚Üí Rishikesh (300km)**

‚Ä¢ Stop at Devprayag (confluence)
‚Ä¢ Rishikesh hotel (‚Çπ5,000)
‚Ä¢ Evening Ganga aarti

**Day 10: Rishikesh ‚Üí Delhi (230km)**

‚Ä¢ Afternoon: Drive back to Delhi
‚Ä¢ Reach evening
